alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Norton County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Norcatur, or 10 miles west of Norton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Norton County, including the following locations... Reager. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
